attributes.action: Introduce a law to force pubs to use pint glasses with marked level showing an imperial pint of measured liquid .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This flagrant rip off on the consumer has been around for too many years and is long overdue a fix . The price of a pint of beer is now so inflated that short measures are now very profitable and the practice is increasing to an almost blatant level of abuse.
